[i]Kappa's Nostrum[/i] – When Unshou enters, return to your hand target creature card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn.
flavor_text: [i]In exchange for the unusual treasure he found, the kappa gave him a medicine that could heal any cut instantly- even to the point of reattaching a severed limb.[/i]
